signature: SetView<E> intersection(Set<? extends E>, Set<? extends E>)

enhanced_by.method_name: difference(Set<? extends E>, Set<? extends E>)

enhanced_by.method_name: union(Set<? extends E>, Set<? extends E>)

The intersection method can be tested for equality against expected results using the isEqualSet method.
